entries.name: backtrace
entries.desc: @return [Exception] the backtrace of the exception raised by the evaluation of the dsl file.

entries.name: description
entries.desc: @return [String] the description that should be presented to the user.

entries.name: dsl_path
entries.desc: @return [String] the path of the dsl file that raised the exception.

entries.name: contents()
entries.desc: @return [String] the contents of the DSL that cause the exception to

entries.name: to_s()
entries.desc: The message of the exception reports the content of podspec for the line that generated the original exception.
